original_title: Mahler:  Symphony No. 4 / Schoenberg:  Pelleas and Melisande
overview: Gustav Mahler's fourth symphony and Pelleas et Melisande by Arnold Schoenberg performed by the Gustav Mahler Jugendorchester, conducted by Claudio Abbado.  Soprano Juliane Banse is featured on the Mahler symphony
title: Mahler:  Symphony No. 4 / Schoenberg:  Pelleas and Melisande
